definitions.title: vb. Hiph.
definitions.body: lay, spread, late (Ges:§ 71; Aram. [[יְחַע]] Pa. Aph. id., also expound, ‘ auslegen;’ Ar. wad.a9a is put or lay (down, on a place, etc.), but d. = Aram. [[ע]])—

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יַצִּיעַ]] Is 58:5; [[אַצִּ֫יעָה]] Ps 139:8; lay, spread out, sq. acc. [[שׂק ואפר]] Is 58:5; [[שׁאול]] Ps 139:8 if I spread out She’ôl (as my couch).

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pf. De Di al.) be laid, spread; subj. [[שׂק ואפר]] Es 4:3; subj. [[רִמָּה]] worm, as couch for king of Babylon Is 14:11.
